la_groups <- seq(90, -90, by = -2)

colnames(xwOBA_matrix) <- paste("LA", head(la_groups, -1), "to", tail(la_groups, -1), sep = "_")
rownames(xwOBA_matrix) <- paste("EV", head(ev_groups, -1), "to", tail(ev_groups, -1), sep = "_")
